# commandLine

**Instance Property**

The command-line parameters to pass to the Linux kernel at boot time.

## Declaration

```swift
var commandLine: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

For information about the parameters you can pass to a Linux kernel, see “[https://www.kernel.org/doc/html/latest/admin-guide/kernel-parameters.html]”.

## Configuring the boot parameters

- **initialRamdiskURL**: The location of an optional RAM disk, which the boot loader maps into memory before it boots the Linux kernel.

items.description: The location of an optional RAM disk, which the boot loader maps into memory before it boots the Linux kernel.
